entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature 'document highlights' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68328
  • Prefer "this" when referencing an override function (CodeStyle option in C#) #68326
  • VB.Net Pretty listing (reformatting) of code changes floating point number #68323
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68320
  • MyProject.GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig' could not be found. Receiving error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 #68319
  • Region analysis produces unexpected result for ref-expression. #68315

Closed

  • Enum.GetName called on a non-enum type #68329
  • Generated field is not working well since the last update #68322
  • Edit and Continue for members of generic types #29667
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68327
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Enum.GetName correctly #68330
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make 'generate field' work better with implicit object creation #68325
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache evaluated parameters for public method symbols #68256
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • CodePages reference only needed for netstandard #68324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move inline arrays tests to Emit2 project due to reaching the string heap limit #68321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that we always run all diagnostic suppressors for single file analysis #68270
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
